title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 354.3 - Case activity control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 354.3 - Case activity control

State Regulations

Each district shall establish and maintain supervisory
control of required interviews with recipients, periodic redetermination of
eligibility, periodic reauthorizations of assistance, issuance of notices to
recipients, and shall record the completion of such action. There shall be
maintained, easily available to the social service staff, a current, cumulative
record of assistance authorized. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
354.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
